column3: Latest;Phnom Penh:------Â Authorities arrested two suspects after gunshots were fired at a Chinese owned shop in Chom Chao I commune
column6: at 11:20 am November 2019.------The suspects fled the scene
column7: but were quickly captured.------Authorities have confirmed that the the suspects are Chinese nationals.------The cause of the shooting remains unknown. ------TVFB ------(video in link)------UPDATE: Two Chinese men confirmed as arrested
column8: one near the market and another in an industrial park in Chom Chao. A weapon has also been recovered. At least two shots were fired in an what appears to have been a robbery attempt. AREY
